resources.string: Name must be longer than 2 characters
The birthday you entered is invalid
This nickname is invalid. Try a different one.
This photo is invalid. Try a different one.
Make sure to activate your account within 24 hours

string.name: bugreport_dialog_submit_content
string.Data: "You're saving software logs on this device now. Logs may contain personal info and your location data. Don't share logs with anyone else if you don't want this info to be exposed. Selecting \"Agree\" means that you've read and agreed to our Privacy Policy and User Agreement."

resources.string: Add original image or short video
"If the issue you're reporting is related to camera's image quality, add an original sample photo (uncropped) to help us locate the issue. Add photo now?"
"MIUI is generating a log. This might affect the overall performance of your device. If you can't reproduce the issue you want to report, go back to logs and tap \"Cancel\"."
"1. Go back to the feature you want to report and reproduce it. 2. Come back to this page and tap \"Finish and upload\"."
"1. Tap \"Generate log\". 2. Go back to the feature you want to report and reproduce it. 3. Come back to this page and tap \"Finish and upload\"."
Audio, sound recording, and call audio
Tap to go back to logs

"You're generating logs and saving them on your device. The logs may contain the information about the audio on your device, including playback history and recording history. Be careful and don't disclose these logs to other people. By tapping \"Agree\" below, you're agreeing that we'll collect the above data while generating logs, and then upload the logs to our servers in order to locate and solve the issues you report."

"You're generating logs and saving them on your device. The logs may contain Bluetooth device usage info (including call history, messages, transferred files etc.). Be careful and don't disclose these logs to other people. By tapping \"Agree\" below, you're agreeing that we'll collect the above data while generating logs, and then upload the logs to our servers in order to locate and solve the issues you report."

"You're generating logs and saving them on your device. The logs may contain your personal info and location info. Be careful and don't disclose these logs to other people. By tapping \"Agree\" below, you're agreeing that we'll collect the above data while generating logs, and then upload the logs to our servers in order to locate and solve the issues you report."

"You're generating logs and saving them on your device. The logs may contain the information collected by your device's sensors (including ambient light sensor, barometer, pedometer, magnetometer, etc.). Be careful and don't disclose these logs to other people. By tapping \"Agree\" below, you're agreeing that we'll collect the above data while generating logs, and then upload the logs to our servers in order to locate and solve the issues you report."

"You're generating logs and saving them on your device. The logs may contain your messages, call history, network info, and communication data. Be careful and don't disclose these logs to other people. By tapping \"Agree\" below, you're agreeing that we'll collect the above data while generating logs, and then upload the logs to our servers in order to locate and solve the issues you report."

"You're generating logs and saving them on your device. The logs may contain your personal info, location info, as well as the IP and MAC addresses of your device. If you're connected to an unencrypted Wi-Fi network, we might also be able to access parts of your communication data. Be careful and don't disclose these logs to other people. By tapping \"Agree\" below, you're agreeing that we'll collect the above data while generating logs, and then upload the logs to our servers in order to locate and solve the issues you report."

"You're generating logs and saving them on your device. The logs may contain your personal info, location info, as well as the IP and MAC addresses of your device. If you're connected to an unencrypted WLAN network, we might also be able to access parts of your communication data. Be careful and don't disclose these logs to other people. By tapping \"Agree\" below, you're agreeing that we'll collect the above data while generating logs, and then upload the logs to our servers in order to locate and solve the issues you report."
This phone number was associated with Mi Account %2$s on %1$s. It will no longer be associated with Mi Account %3$s if you continue. Continue?
This app needs to connect to the internet to work normally.
"Sent logs successfully. ID:%s Send this code to the supervisor."
"Any changes you've made to this report will be lost."
This email address is already associated with another Mi Account.
The email address you entered is invalid.
This phone number is already associated with another Mi Account.
This phone number is already associated with another Mi Account
"Couldn't get FAQ info, check network connection"
"You can describe the issue you've encountered and we'll try to fix it. Submit feedback?"
In some cases (…) my phone misbehaves (…).

"Describe the issue you've encountered here. %1$d. In what app or on what page have you encountered the issue? %2$d. After what actions that you performed did the issue appear? %3$d. Give us the additional information that might help us fix the issue."
"Tell us how you'd like to improve MIUI."
"I'd like you to add a new feature () because I need ()."
"Sign in with your Mi Account to view details and your report's progress"
Sign in with your Mi Account so that our engineers could contact you.
"You can also view your report's progress in \"My reports\"."
Add an image or short video
Report bugs every time you encounter problems to help us solve them faster.
"We'll notify you about your report's progress"
Go to \"My reports\" to view details
Which third party app causes problems?
Logs are used only for diagnostics.
"You can associate up to 3 Mi Accounts with a phone number. Can't add new accounts."
Too many verification codes have been sent to this number. Wait 24 hours and try again.
"We'll use this email to verify your account"
"Logs will help us locate and fix the issue you're about to report much faster. Generate logs and attach them to your feedback."
For accessing Mi Account info in order to identify device
Submitting feedback, generating logs, viewing frequently asked questions

"In order to improve the services provided to you, we'll upload usage stats and system logs to our servers. These items may include your personal information, as well as the information about your device and networks. We'll use uploaded items to locate and analyze the problems in the system."
For accessing device model, IMEI, and device ID in order to locate and solve issues
For accessing storage and saving items including logs, images, and videos
All feedback features were moved to the new \"Services & feedback\" app. The Feedback app will be removed from your Home screen. Tap \"Open\" to try \"Services & feedback\".
"Looks like you're connected to a paid network. Uploading logs may generate additional fees."
"Looks like you're connected to a paid network. Uploading logs requires %sMB of mobile data."
No network connection, tap here to go to Settings
Your report will be sent when you have a data connection.
To add an account, scan the QR code again after you sign in.
The email address you entered is invalid
"You haven't set the password yet. Sign in with SMS."
Agree to the terms and conditions first
The username you entered is invalid
(Users outside China should enter the mobile phone number in the following format: +[area code][phone number], e.g.: +91 817282982)
Password must be 8-16 characters long and combine at least two of the following: digits, letters, and special symbols (e.g. 123abc@#, or 123abc, or abc@#).
Too many accounts have been associated with this number. Try a different one.
You need to sign in again
Too many verification codes have been sent to this number. Wait 24 hours and try again.
Too many verification codes have been sent to this number. Wait 24 hours and try again.
Add your phone number to protect your account.
Check your network settings and try again
"I've read and agree to Xiaomi's User Agreement and Privacy Policy."
"I've read and agree to the following documents: Xiaomi's User Agreement and Privacy Policy, %3$s."
The code you entered is incorrect
The format of the phone number you entered is invalid
The code you entered is incorrect
The code you entered is incorrect
This phone has been associated with several Mi Accounts in a short period of time. Try using another phone number.
"Your feedback along with error logs will be sent to Mi's servers."
"You've requested too many verification emails. Make sure that the verification email isn't in your inbox's Spam folder."
It may take some time to receive SMS. Start over anyway?
"Can't be the same as current password"
Sign in with your Mi Account
Session expired. Sign in again to reconnect this account.
Too many attempts. Try other ways to sign in.
Looks like logs are being generated now. Stop generating them and upload the ones that are ready?

string.name: submit_dialog_content
string.Data: "You must agree to our Privacy Policy and User Agreement to be able to use Feedback. The issues you report along with the items you attach (might contain personal information, as well as the information about your device and network) will be uploaded to MIUI's servers. This will help us locate and solve the problems you report."

string.name: submit_dialog_content_global
string.Data: "Your feedback, along with attachments (if any) and logs (you can uncheck the corresponding boxes for the items you don't want to upload) will be sent to MIUI's servers. Logs may contain personal info and your location data. Selecting \"Agree\" means that you've read and agreed to our Privacy Policy and User Agreement."

resources.string: "To help our engineers locate and solve the problem you encountered as soon as possible, we recommend that you upload the related logs. Logs are only used to analyze problems and won't be used for other purposes."
The code you entered is incorrect
Similar issues in the MIUI forum
You can only generate one log at a time.
"This file format isn't supported. Try selecting a different file."
Your report is missing some info
"The required log was deleted or doesn't exist"
"Can't upload. The log is too big."
"Couldn't send. Can't connect to the network."
"This topic doesn't exist, was deleted, or edited."
"Can't upload images or videos bigger than 100MB."
You can update to the version %1$s now.
You need to verify your identity before you update the recovery email.

This service need to ask your permission follows, we will strictly abide by relevant laws to protect your personal information:

Access Camera: experience real-time recording services for setting Avatar

If you do not agree to call the above permissions, this function will not work properly, but it will not affect your use of the basic functions of this application. You can choose to turn off the above permission call in the system settings to withdraw your consent.
Connect Download Manager failed, please check the Download Manager state in the Application Management.
Storage unavailable, please check the SD card.
Android SQLite API based on SQLCipher
